meanings.definition: To surpass in striding or walking.
meanings.sent1: She outstrides her friends when they go for a walk.
meanings.sent2: He always outstrides everyone in the race.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a race to see who could outstrides the other.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed outstrides any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's speed outstrides that of any other land animal.

meanings.definition: To outdo in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: The movie outstrides all others in its running time.
meanings.sent2: His speech outstrides the usual time limit for presentations.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner decided to outstrides his previous record by a mile.
meanings.sent4: Her patience outstrides that of anyone I know.
meanings.sent5: The river outstrides its banks during the rainy season.
